casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Tony Robert JONES. No. 669P03. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 5, 2004. Anne M. Middleton, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th day of December 2003 by Defendant for a New Sentencing Hearing:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of February 2004."
